      An error that is thrown when the program runs into a square of an invalid color.

      An exception that is thrown when white is used as a normal color.

      • hueChange

        public static int hueChange(PietColor oldColor,
            PietColor newColor)
        Gets the change in the hue cycle between two colors.
        Parameters:
        oldColor - The old PietColor.
        newColor - The new PietColor.
        Returns:
        Hue.hueChange(oldColor.hue, newColor.hue); - The difference between the two colors' position on the hue cycle.
        See Also:
        Hue.hueChange(Hue oldHue, Hue newHue)

        newColor - The new PietColor.
        Returns:

        See Also:
